prompt: Subject: The Woman (late 20s, warm brown shoulder-length loosely worn hair, comfortable creative attire). Context: Desaturated, muted-toned flashback environment with a vague past conflict blurred in the distant background. Action: Standing still at a distance, observing the conflict with a calm, accepting expression—soft eyes, slight head tilt, and a gentle exhale. Style: Desaturated, muted flashback aesthetic. Composition: Medium shot (establishing her distance from the conflict) transitioning to close-up (emphasizing her accepting expression). Ambiance: Soft diffused light, muted desaturated tones, understated and gentle mood.
camera_movement: Slow, subtle push-in from medium shot to close-up
